phrases: Dijun, what do you have in your arms?
You cannot tell from looking what this is?
I have just never seen Dijun have any relations with a woman.
I am shocked.
Is not that Qing Qiu's little princess?
She is a nice girl.
A nice girl.
But you should not mess with Qing Qiu.
Dijun, my second brother and Ye Hua both fell into their hands.
You have to think about this carefully.
It is not easy being a son-in-law of the Fox Clan.
Did she get tricked into eating a drunken fruit?
Go ask your woman about it.
- Dijun. - Dijun.
Where does Feng Jiu sleep?
That bed.
Dong Hua... Dong Hua.
Dijun.
Did you carry me back to the palace yesterday?
That is right.
Then... were you the one who fed me two bowls of sobering soup?
No, it was three bowls.
Is there anything else you want to ask?
If there is nothing else, then I have to head to court.
Then... how should we account for the sobering soup?
I do not mind if you add it to the debt of having saved your life.
What?
What?
You do not want to pay that debt?
- No, that is not it.
That is fine too.
A couple bowls of sobering soup are not a big deal.
No, I have to pay back the debt of sobering soup too.
I cannot break Qing Qiu's rules.
I cannot embarrass Aunt.
Seems like your aunt taught you quite well.
My aunt has always taught me by words and example.
Even my mom and dad say I am most like my aunt when she was young.
Oh?
You are most like your aunt?
When your aunt was young, she was a disciple at Kunlun Mountain.
She was more overbearing than you.
With one wave of the Jade Purity Fan of Kunlun
she got rid of 18 immortals.
How come I have never heard Aunt talk about that?
While you were at the Celestial Palace, has Si Ming told you about
what kind of person Dong Hua Dijun is?
He keeps away from worldly affairs
even major events that deal with the peace of all the realms.
He does not respect others, and does not go to banquets.
He is the kind of immortal you would hang a portrait of on your wall.
So you do not have to worry about me knowing about this.
I am an immortal who does not gossip with others.
Really?
You really will not tell others that my Aunt is Si Yin?
I will not.
This is Qing Qiu's biggest secret.
I just accidentally overheard it.
Even Mo Yuan's...
Come to think of it
Lord of Numinous Treasures and I have a special fate with your aunt.
After your aunt marries and comes to the Celestial Palace
I will talk to her about this.
Did not you promise me you would not tell outsiders about this?
Does your aunt count as an outsider?
No.
Then I will head over to court.
Okay.
You are back.
Hurry and add some firewood.
What is wrong?
Did smoke get in your eyes?
Come here.
Let me see.
Do you know that you have been gone for one year and nine months?
I know.
Are not you scared that I will be old when you come back?
I am.
That is why I am making plans for us to stay together for a long, long time.
Is it because your family does not like me?
Or is it because you already have a wife?
Before marrying you, I have never been married before.
Do not cry.
I kept thinking about what I should do if you already had a wife.
All right.
Everything's okay now.
Why did you make such a complicated dish?
Why not?
Should I make you eat raw meat every day?
What is with your face of disgust?
It is like someone has forced you to eat raw meat before.
Someone has.
Really?
Who was so tactless and forced you to eat raw meat?
All right, get ready to eat.
Okay.
Eat while it is hot.
I have to go far away again.
You have to leave again?
I have to leave tomorrow morning.
How long will you be gone for this time?
One year?
Two years?
Or ten years?
Su Su.
Take me with you this time.
No.
Why not?
It is dangerous.
I cannot take you with me.
I am not scared of danger, no matter how bad it is.
I am scared of not being with you.
I never know where you are.
I never know when you will be back.
I really do not want to continue like this.
Ye Hua, what do you take me for?
Do you think of me as your wife?
If so, then we should be interdependent and go through everything together.
Su Su, you do not understand.
I do not want you to be in any danger.
You do not understand either.
I would rather be with you and in danger.
Pack up tonight.
We will head out tomorrow morning.
- Really? - What?
You want to back out now?
Why would I back out?
Where are you taking me?
You will know when we get there.
Okay.
Let us eat.
I am going far away.
I cannot feed you anymore.
If fate allows, let us meet again in the future.
Su Su.
This is a fan for you.
Fan?
What?
Is something wrong with it?
This fan is really similar to the one I gave away.
Even the painting on it is similar.
The priest told me that the painting was of Kunlun Mountain.
Most fans look the same.
There are only a limited number of mountains to paint.
That is true.
But it looks too similar.
Su Su, hide behind the trees.
What is wrong?
Those guys look pretty good.
Yes, let us catch them and offer them to our leader.
Let us go!
Hide!
Master?
Ye Hua.
Are you okay?
I am fine.
What about you?
Seventeenth?
No, she is clearly a woman
and a mortal with no magic breath.
How could I have mistaken her?
But if she is not Seventeenth, why does she have Master's fan?
And this man...
Although he looks very similar to Master, he does not have Master's magic breath.
Who exactly is he?
Who exactly are these two people?
Where are you from?
Wait here for me.
May I speak to you somewhere else?
Okay.
Are you Water King of West Sea's second son Die Feng?
I am.
And you are?
I am Crown Prince Ye Hua.
Your High-
I came undercover to Chang Sea on Heavenly Lord's orders.
I do not want anyone else to know my identity.
Including that person.
I understand.
What is Your Highness here at Chang Sea for?
The mermaid clan.
So it was because of the mermaid clan.
I knew the Celestial Palace would make a move soon.
How did Your Highness know my identity?
I heard from a general of one of the clans
that for the past thousands of years
you have been helping the Water King of Chang Sea to ward off the mermaid clan.
Furthermore, from your expression when you saw me
I could tell you mistook me for your master, Mo Yuan.
You are very meticulous in your observation.
I am impressed.
Does Your Highness know where that Jade Purity Fan of Kunlun came from?
It was in the mortal world and then ended up in Li Jing's hands.
Since it was a magic artifact of Kunlun Mountain, I asked him for it.
Li Jing?
Your Highness, please come with me to Chang Sea and tell me in detail.
Do not call me Your Highness.
You can call me Hua Ye instead.
This is the Crystal Palace of Chang Sea.
After entering here, you will have left the mortal world
and entered into the immortal world.
Ye Hua, what were you two talking so seriously about just now?
I was asking him if he could not expose the fact this this fan was a counterfeit
so that I will not be embarrassed before my wife.
Yeah, right.
I do not believe you.
You two talked for that long about this?
What do you think we were talking about?
Look at him.
He is dressed like that, which must mean he is very important.
After seeing how amazing you were, is he trying to recruit you as a general?
You should read less plays.
Did I guess wrong?
I am a mortal.
How could an immortal regard me so highly?
He is an immortal?
Sir, do you know that one day in the immortal world
is one year in the mortal world?
Once you enter into the sea, every day that goes by
is one whole year, with all the seasons.
I read about that in a play.
A few months for you guys is a lifetime for us.
So what if we live for a long time?
I have been spending the past 70,000 years looking for someone
but have not made any progress at all.
Is not that like living in vain?
Are you looking for a relative?
Not a relative, but someone more important than a relative.
Let us go.
Big Brother.
Yan Zhi.
Big Brother, I have made all the arrangements.
I will send you to a secret place
where Second Brother absolutely will not be able to find you.
Why do I have to flee from him?
Second Brother has already been Ghost Lord for 70,000 years.
His position is stable.
And Father's trusted confidants are all gone.
Big Brother, just find a place to settle down.
All the jewels I have collected through the years
should be enough for you to live a luxurious life.
Go away!
Big Brother, you...
Yan Zhi!
Come here, Yan Zhi.
Are you okay?
It is my fault.
What I have been through in prison for the past 70,000 years...
you cannot even imagine it.
Since I just came out, my mood is all over the place.
I lost control.
I understand.
Yan Zhi, it is good that you understand.
Yan Zhi, I absolutely will not let Li Jing get away with this.
Big Brother!
All right.
I will not say anything else you would not want to hear.
Your Highnesses, I have made all the arrangements.
We can go to Chang Sea now.
Chang Sea?
That is right.
My mother was from the mermaid clan of Chang Sea.
For now, it seems they are the only ones I can rely on.
- But Big Brother... - Yan Zhi.
I just want to find a safe place I can live.
You should know very well
that Li Jing and I hate each other because of our mothers' deaths.
He will eventually find out that I have escaped.
At that time, he will definitely send men to come kill me.
For now, it seems like only my mother's clan can protect me, right?
You and Second Brother are both equally important to me.
I really do not want to see you two fighting to the death.
Big Brother, do you understand?
I do.
I understand.
Scarlet Flame Golden Lion!
Your Highness.
They have been my trusted confidants for years!
Why did you kill them?
Your Highness, our journey is top secret.
If any of them leaks news of our journey
maybe you would not be killed
but His Highness and I would die and not be buried.
They all grew up with me.
They would not betray me!
Yan Zhi, there are no trusted confidants in the world.
In the past, I was betrayed by so-called trusted confidants
and lost my position as Ghost Lord
and locked in prison for 70,000 years!
All right.
I will not talk about this anymore.
Let us go.
Ye Hua, are we inside the Crystal Palace now?
That is right.
Why are you so calm?
How should I be?
Oh right, you are like an immortal.
You must have seen this place in a dream before.
Yes, I have seen it before.
- Uncle! -
It must have been hard on you.
I am sorry for always making you come here for Chang Sea affairs.
Uncle, you do not have to apologize.
The four seas are one clan.
Oh yeah, these are two of my friends.
I brought them into Chang Sea without asking for permission first.
I hope you will forgive me.
It is okay.
It is okay.
If they are your friends, then they are my honored guests.
Come on inside!
Su Su, I need to discuss some things with Die Feng.
If you are tired, you can just sleep here.
If you want to walk around, remember to bring the copper mirror.
Why do I have to bring the copper mirror?
I am afraid you will get lost.
Okay.
Princess, do not be sad.
This leaf fan is a treasure that Water King gave you.
It is covered in tears.
Are not you ruining a precious item?
Besides, Water King only said
he would marry one princess to the Mermaid King.
It might not be you.
There is also First Princess.
First Princess is the most scheming.
I cannot beat her.
She might even be talking to Father now about marrying me off.
The mermaid king looks very sinister.
If I really marry him...
Then why do not you listen to Water God and marry First Prince of West Sea?
But First Prince is sickly.
Then what about Second Prince?
Second Prince is pretty good.
He used to be Mo Yuan's senior disciple too.
But...
Your Highness, you still want to marry into the Celestial Palace?
You have never even met that crown prince before.
How can you be so infatuated?
Crown Prince's reputation has spread far and wide.
In the four seas and eight realms
he is the only spiritual master of both Buddhism and Taoism.
He is also the last disciple of the Realm of Supreme Purity's Lord Yuan Shi.
Yes.
I heard that when he was born
the 36 skies radiated golden rays in an instant.
The 72 rainbow birds of the Mount Junji of the Far East
soared into the sky and circled the Celestial Palace for 81 days.
I can already recite all this.
Who is there?
What?
Was what you overhead that amusing?
What that princess said was really amusing.
Sit down.
I will tell you.
She does not want to marry Mermaid King.
So she thought she might as well marry Second Prince Die Feng.
But she cannot bear to part with the celestial crown prince.
Do not you think it is amusing?
The problem is all three of them are not interested in her.
Is that so?
When she was talking about the crown prince, she just went on and on.
Is the celestial crown prince that famous?
There is only one celestial crown prince in the world.
How could he not be famous?
That is true.
The Princess of Chang Sea is still a princess.
She is never even met him before, but she pines for him.
That means the celestial crown prince must be very charming.
What?
Are you also interested in him?
Are you jealous?
No.
It is just that when compared to the crown prince, I have nothing.
I am making things hard for you.
I already told you that I do not mind.
Thank you for not minding.
This place is great.
It is too bad there is only the smell of seawater here.
There is no smell of flowers.
I really want to smell peach blossoms.
I know of a place.
There, peach blossoms bloom all year long.
Where is it?
Close your eyes.
I will take you there.
You can open your eyes now.
Is this a fantasy?
No.
Then where is this place?
Qing Qiu, Ten Mile Peach Tree Woods.
Ten Mile Peach Tree Woods?
There are ten miles of this?
That is right.
There was someone who spent a long time to plant these woods.
He did not have much else to do anyway.
All day long, he just takes care of peach blossoms and ferments peach blossom wine.
What a life to live.
Are you envious?
Huh?
What is there to be envious of?
We spend our days like this at Mount Junji.
Every day, there is not much to do.
We just go hunting, cook, and raise pets, right?
That is right.
We do not have to be envious of others.
Are you friends with the person who works here?
We have met a couple of times.
Oh.
Is he here?
It does not seem like it.
I do not sense his magic breath.
But it is because he is not here that I brought you here.
Is your relationship bad?
No.
I admire him.
There are just reasons for why it would be inconvenient to see him now.
Oh.
This peach blossom wine is really good.
It seems as if I have had it before.
I did not expect you to have such good alcohol tolerance.
I did not expect it either.
But Ye Hua, can we just take one of his pitchers of wine like this?
It is okay.
I do not think I will ever see him again in the future.
You will not come here to see your friends anymore?
I will not.
Then I will not be able to see this Ten Mile Peach Tree Woods anymore.
In the future, I will plant one for you.
I want it to be ten miles too.
Your Highness must be in a good mood.
You did not come back the whole night.
He tends to indulge in pleasures and forget about everything else.
Judging from the way you carried her inside, I can tell she is a woman.
You are right.
Do not worry.
I am not someone who meddles in other's business.
I just want to remind Your Highness
that with a war at hand, it is better that you send her away soon
especially since she is a mortal.
I think so too.
For her safety, I would rather not have others know about her existence.
To thank Your Highness for coming
to Chang Sea personally to alleviate our suffering
I will not breathe a word about this.
Thank you.
Back to the topic of the war between Chang Sea and the mermaid clan...
my uncle really does not want to start a war.
He does not want to have a complete fallout with the mermaid clan.
You have been here for thousands of years and know the situation here best.
Is there any way to make him make a decision quickly?
There is.
Your Highness, do not hesitate anymore.
Second Prince of West Sea does not have any concubines yet.
If you marry him, you will be the princess consort.
And I also heard that
First Prince of West Sea has been ill for a long time.
In the future, the position of Water King of the West Sea
will be Second Prince Die Feng's.
Every day, he just wields weapons and fights with the mermaid clan.
Besides, I have known him for thousands of years
and he is never felt anything for me.
In just a few days, how could he...
Your Highness, look.
I found a way to get First Princess's secret recipe.
I specially gathered the earliest morning dew to make this fine wine.
Take it and try it.
Your Highness, do not hesitate anymore.
If a woman puts her mind to it, anything is possible.
Your Highness, look.
Speak of the devil.
Second Prince is here.
Die Feng.
This is?
This is my friend.
Friend?
Your friend should have a name.
Hua Ye.
What a nice name.
It is very similar to the Crown Prince of the Nine Heaven's name.
I guess people with such nice names must all be sage-like.
Father plans to make the wedding day the third of next month.
That soon?
It is soon
but I guess he is afraid some accident might happen again on the wedding day.
Accident?
I am afraid that Qing Qiu's Bai Qian
is scared of her second fiance getting taken away.
So she is wants to marry into the family quickly.
What a pity.
My aunt is the most beautiful in all the realms.
What would she be scared of?
Besides, the patriarchs arranged this marriage.
She might not even look kindly upon her fiance.
Why would she be scared of him getting taken away?
Dijun, try this.
This nut is really good.
Si Ming told me to treat you well.
Okay.
Little Princess, you have helped me.
I was going to lose this game.
But this is great.
Dijun.
What was Qing Qiu's response for making the third of next month the wedding day?
They have not given a response yet.
First, Heavenly Lord made a proclamation
about Bai Qian's great service by sealing Qing Cang.
Then he seized the opportunity to have this wedding.
But now that we do not know where Bai Qian is
how am I supposed to answer them?
With Qian Qian missing, who cares about this wedding?
Why do not we just break off the engagement?
We cannot break off the engagement.
You and I personally arranged this marriage back then.
If we cannot hastily break off the engagement without a good reason
we will definitely be criticized.
That is right.
Fifth Sister's engagement with Second Prince was already broken.
If her engagement with Crown Prince is broken too
no one in all the realms would ever dare to propose marriage.
Even if they were interested, they would be afraid of offending the Celestial Tribe.
Would not that be worse for Fifth Sister?
But they want the wedding on the third of next month.
Where are we going to find a Bai Qian for the wedding?
Why do not we say this?
Now that everyone in the four seas knows that Bai Qian sealed Qing Cang
we can say that she was injured, and is recuperating.
We can use this to delay the wedding.
That is not a bad idea.
We could, but we cannot just keep delaying the wedding.
When I first went through godly ascension, I also slept for a millennium.
As long as Bai Qian is still alive
no matter where she is, we will eventually find her.
Ye Hua, that princess has been following us
from the Crystal Palace to here.
Will she follow us to bed at night?
Now it is your turn to get jealous.
There are a lot of injured soldiers inside.
It would not be good for a woman to enter.
Wait for me here.
Sir, is Hua Ye married?
From what I know, he has a wife at home.
What?
What kind of person is she?
She is a mortal.
Mortal?
Then if I marry him, he does not have to be a mortal anymore.
Marry him?
Yes.
If I transfer some of my magic powers to him, he can become an immortal.
That would not be impossible.
It is just that if I marry him
I will have to be the legal wife, since I am a princess.
He will have to divorce his mortal wife.
She has to be treated that way because she is a mortal?
No.
Sir, please do not misunderstand.
I do not look down on mortals.
It is just that there are differences between mortals and immortals.
If he marries me, he has to become immortal.
If he becomes immortal, he cannot be with his mortal wife.
It is because that is our rule.
Then we will have to see if he wants to become immortal.
Why would a mortal not want to become an immortal?
